isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - VALVE COVER(S) AND/OR GASKET; R & R AND/OR REPLACE

wtsproc.wtsdescrip: VALVE COVER(S) AND/OR GASKET; R & R AND/OR REPLACE

step1.para: Install wheel chocks and open hood.
Remove engine housing cover if required. Include remove or reposition seat, shifter lever, cup holder, trim and floor mat as necessary.
Disconnect battery to ground cable, include ECM ground.
Remove charge air cooler outlet hose at valve cover and cooler. Cap open ports.
Disconnect surge tank hose (overflow), include disconnect coolant level sensor connector and disconnect wire from hose.
Disconnect air conditioning compressor assembly if applicable and secure out of way. Include disconnect compressor belt, hose support clamps and compressor clutch wire connector.
Disconnect engine control wiring harness from valve cover and secure out of way.
Disconnect alternator wiring at alternator and from valve cover including support clamps. Secure out of way.
Remove alternator wiring support bracket from valve cover.
Disconnect injector wiring harness at valve cover and disconnect under valve cover harness connector from valve cover.
Remove heater hose clamp for access.
Disconnect manifold pressure sensor (map) wiring.
Remove crankcase ventilation pipe.
Remove valve/intake cover bolts and valve cover from vehicle, include mark studs for ease of installation.
Clean mating surfaces.
Install valve/intake cover to vehicle, include connect under valve cover wiring connector to valve cover. Torque bolts to spec.
Install crankcase ventilation pipe.
Connect manifold pressure sensor (map) wiring.
Connect injector wiring harness at valve cover.
Install alternator wiring support bracket to valve cover.
Connect alternator wiring harness to valve cover, support clamps and at alternator.
Install heater hose clamp.
Connect electronic engine control wire harness to valve cover. Include tape plastic clip to harness.
Install air conditioning compressor assembly if applicable. Include connect compressor belt, hose support clamps and compressor clutch wire.
Connect surge tank hose (overflow), include connect coolant level sensor connector at tank and strap harness to hose.
Connect charge air cooler outlet hose at cooler and valve cover.
Connect battery to ground cable, include ECM ground.
Start engine and check for leaks. Top off fluids as needed.
Install engine housing cover if required. Include install seat, shifter lever, cup holder, trim and floor mat.
Close hood and remove wheel chocks.
